statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_guests WHERE guest_id = 123;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, room_type FROM hotel_guests WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_id, guest_name FROM hotel_guests WHERE room_type = 'Suite' ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_guests FROM hotel_guests;
SELECT * FROM hotel_guests WHERE guest_name LIKE '%John%' AND room_number < 100 ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM hotel_guests WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hotel_guests WHERE room_type = 'Suite' ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM hotel_guests WHERE room_type = 'Standard' AND room_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, room_number FROM hotel_guests WHERE room_type IN ('Deluxe', 'Standard') ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, room_type FROM hotel_guests WHERE guest_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking_details WHERE booking_id = 'e97540a3-6eb0-4d0e-8164-3af3fd8f221e';
SELECT guest_name, check_out_date FROM booking_details WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM room_preferences WHERE room_type = 'Suite' AND floor_number = 2;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, room_type FROM booking_details JOIN room_preferences ON booking_details.booking_id = room_preferences.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, floor_number FROM booking_details JOIN room_preferences ON booking_details.booking_id = room_preferences.guest_id WHERE floor_number < 3;
SELECT * FROM room_preferences WHERE floor_number > 5;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking_details WHERE guest_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT room_id, room_type FROM room_preferences WHERE room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, room_type FROM booking_details bd JOIN room_preferences rp ON bd.booking_id = rp.guest_id;
SELECT * FROM booking_details bd LEFT JOIN room_preferences rp ON bd.booking_id = rp.guest_id WHERE rp.room_type = 'Standard' ORDER BY bd.check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guest_info;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_info ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_phone FROM guest_info WHERE guest_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking_details WHERE check_out_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM room_preferences WHERE bed_type = 'Queen' AND smoking_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM guest_info WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking_details WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_info WHERE guest_id = 'c1e7a7d5-0499-4b3c-a5d5-2f50c1b87257';
SELECT * FROM room_preferences WHERE bed_type = 'Queen';
SELECT room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking_details WHERE guest_id = '5f7ae4c1-d892-438a-b31e-1b73ed488516';
SELECT * FROM guest_info ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_email, check_in_date FROM guest_info WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guest_info WHERE guest_id = 3;
SELECT room_type, bed_type, max_guests FROM room_preferences WHERE smoking_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_price FROM booking_details ORDER BY booking_date;
SELECT * FROM guest_info WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_info WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_type, bed_type, max_guests FROM room_preferences WHERE smoking_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM hotel_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC, review_id ASC;

SELECT booking_id, guest_name, room_type, total_price FROM booking_details INNER JOIN guest_info ON booking_details.guest_id = guest_info.guest_id INNER JOIN room_preferences ON booking_details.room_number = room_preferences.room_number;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, email FROM guests WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT room_number, room_type, status FROM rooms WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT guest_name, phone_number FROM guests WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM guests WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT guest_name, room_type, check_in_date FROM guests JOIN bookings ON guests.guest_id = bookings.guest_id WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE status = 'Available' ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT staff_name, role, department FROM staff WHERE role = 'Manager';
